data.trans: Ghé lại nơi nào dọc đường (ở 1 vài đêm)
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi ghé lại Malaysia trong một vài đêm trên đường đến Úc.
data.en_hint: We're stopping over in Malaysia for a couple of nights on the way to Australia.
data.content_game_1: We're stopping over in Malaysia for a couple of nights on the way to Australia.
data.answer_en_hint: We're stopping over in Malaysia for a couple of nights on the way to Australia.

data.trans_hint: Máy bay cất cánh muộn hai giờ.
data.en_hint: The plane took off two hours late.
data.content_game_1: The plane took off two hours late.
data.answer_en_hint: The plane took off two hours late.

data.trans_hint: Họ đang mong được đi du lịch vài ngày vào dịp Lễ Phục Sinh.
data.en_hint: They're hoping to get away for a few days at Easter.
data.content_game_1: They're hoping to Get away for a few days at Easter.
data.answer_en_hint: They're hoping to Get away for a few days at Easter.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi vừa mới trở về từ chuyến đi ngày hôm qua.
data.en_hint: We just got back from our trip yesterday.
data.content_game_1: We just Got back from our trip yesterday.
data.answer_en_hint: We just Got back from our trip yesterday.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi khởi hành từ lúc rạng sáng tại thủ đô.
data.en_hint: We departed at the crack of dawn from the capital.
data.content_game_1: We departed at the crack of dawn from the capital.
data.answer_en_hint: We departed at the crack of dawn from the capital.

data.trans_hint: Tôi hi vọng tất cả các chuyến bay trong tháng này vẫn chưa được đặt hết chỗ.
data.en_hint: I hope that the flights in this month haven't been all booked up.
data.content_game_1: I hope that the flights in this month haven't been all booked up.
data.answer_en_hint: I hope that the flights in this month haven't been all booked up.

data.trans_hint: Sân bay này rất khó chịu vào mùa hè vì đó là mùa du lịch cao điểm.
data.en_hint: The airport is murder in the summer as it is the peak season of traveling.
data.content_game_1: The airport is murder in the summer as it is the peak season of traveling.
data.answer_en_hint: The airport is murder in the summer as it is the peak season of traveling.

data.trans_hint: Tất cả chúng tôi đã làm xong thủ tục gửi hành lý.
data.en_hint: We all finished checking our luggages in.
data.content_game_1: We all finished checking our luggages in.
data.answer_en_hint: We all finished checking our luggages in.

data.trans: Không kiểu này thì kiểu khác
data.trans_hint: Có lẽ chúng ta phải đợi một chuyến bay khác không kiểu này thì kiểu khác.
data.en_hint: We may have to wait for another flight of one sort or another.
data.content_game_1: We may have to wait for another flight of one sort or another.
data.answer_en_hint: We may have to wait for another flight of one sort or another.

data.trans_hint: Ba mẹ tiễn tôi ở sân bay vào ngày tôi trở về Mỹ.
data.en_hint: My parents saw me off at the airport on the day when I returned the US.
data.content_game_1: My parents saw me off at the airport on the day when I returned the US.
data.answer_en_hint: My parents saw me off at the airport on the day when I returned the US.

data.trans: Nghỉ (trong một thời gian ngắn rồi quay lại)
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã tranh thủ nghỉ việc vào buổi sáng để tiễn bạn gái ở sân bay.
data.en_hint: I took time off in the morning to see my girlfriend off at the airport.
data.content_game_1: I took time off in the morning to see my girlfriend off at the airport.
data.answer_en_hint: I took time off in the morning to see my girlfriend off at the airport.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã ở lại sân bay đến phút cuối để tạm biệt họ.
data.en_hint: I stayed back at the airport till the last minute to say goodbye to them.
data.content_game_1: I stayed back at the airport till the last minute to say goodbye to them.
data.answer_en_hint: I stayed back at the airport till the last minute to say goodbye to them.
